abstract: Many seasoned conflict photographers were shocked when scores of young photographers headed to Libya to cover the uprising earlier this year. But many started in similar ways.
snippet: Many seasoned conflict photographers were shocked when scores of young photographers headed to Libya to cover the uprising earlier this year. But many started in similar ways.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: When scores of young and inexperienced photographers descended on Libya this year to cover the uprising against Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi's government, many seasoned conflict photographers were shocked.

headline.main: Photographing Conflict for the First Time
